description: #Antarctica is my favorite subject. I’ve posted this before but it bears repeating... “Admiral Byrd…Is there any unexplored land on this Earth that might appeal to adventurous young Americans?” “Yes, there is. And not around the North Pole because it’s getting crowded up there ‘cause they find out it’s really usable to live in, but militarily, but strangely enough left in the world today is an area as big as the United States that’s never be seen by human being and that’s ‘BEYOND THE POLE, ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE SOUTH POLE from Middle America’…” So again, I ask you the same question that I have asked you a number of times - WHY DID JOHN KERRY GO TO ANTARCTICA ON THE DAY OF THE 2016 ELECTION? #mymaria777
